description:
What is it: Defines the required state that a device (both physical and virtual) must be in to be considered compliant and before it can access tenant data. 
 Simeon Notes: This policy provides an additional layer of data protection for your Intune managed devices and applies to all devices both physical and virtual. Simeon’s baseline requires that a device have Microsoft Defender Antimalware configured. Policy applies to all devices via the Azure AD group ‘BUILTIN - Corporate Devices’. 
 Learn More: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/mem/intune/protect/device-compliance-get-started
